articles.author: Juli Clover
articles.title: Everything New in the iOS 18.5 Beta - MacRumors
articles.description: Apple today provided developers with the first beta of an upcoming iOS 18.5 update for testing purposes. Work on iOS 18 is starting to wind down with...
articles.content: Apple today provided developers with the first beta of an upcoming iOS 18.5 update for testing purposes. Work on iOS 18 is starting to wind down with iOS 19 set to be introduced in a couple of months… [+1459 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: $70 and $80 game price tags send an early signal about Switch 2 game pricing - Ars Technica
articles.description: All Nintendo titles see an increase from the $60 Switch 1 status quo.
